data.text: @TheCubCaretaker Nah, I don’t wearing a mask because COVID-19 is rolling end on late March this year.
@TheCubCaretaker @FLYINGS04110758 Local guidance can still be false information but I do agree that it us vandalism and shouldn't be torn down.
@MrBigStinkyBoi @FLYINGS04110758 I’m posting the local guidance and replacing vandalized signs :)
@TheCubCaretaker @FLYINGS04110758 So you're spreading false covid information and bitching on Twitter that someone is tearing them down. Hmm. Makes sense.
@TheCubCaretaker I have some people in my building as well that do this. Just dumb.

@FLYINGS04110758 I mean generally I think these signs won’t help change their minds but we hold the line regardless.

I’m 100% flexing my bitchiness 😋
@TheCubCaretaker This Is so great! Perseverance Is the only things those kind of people hate the most. Take care and greetings from Mexico! Stay safe :3
@TheCubCaretaker If you think they will help then good on you for keeping them up.

@TheCubCaretaker Maybe it has changed again but if I’m not mistaken doesn’t resent guild lines suggest using N95 as cloth have shown almost no real Protection and medical mask are not much better at preventing spread.
